summary: A selection of easy commands to see your favourite battles!
descriptionHtml: Want to see who will win between a Giant and a Centurion? Who is the real knock-out of skyrim, a giant or a dragon? Did the thought just pass your mind once about the fact Werewolves and Vampires are in this, game? Eh? Adding these simple text files to your Data folder, allows you input simple commands into the console to conjure these battles, and more can be added, replacing the need for us to input complicated mistake-heavy commands. For a walkthrough, see the video!
author: jamiethe
